constructor-arg.value: select name_rus, name_eng, year, rating, group_concat(g.genre separator ', ') as genreList from movie m join genre_movie gm on m.id = gm.id_movie join genre g on gm.id_genre = g.id group by 1, 2, 3, 4

select name_rus, name_eng, description, year, rating, group_concat(g.genre separator ', ') as genreList, group_concat(distinct cm.country separator ', ') as countryList from movie m join genre_movie gm on m.id = gm.id_movie join genre g on gm.id_genre = g.id join country_movie cm on m.id = cm.movie_id where m.id = ? group by 1, 2, 3, 4, 5
